TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CursorConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供将 对象与其他各种表示形式相互转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基类的"实现类型转换器"。For more information about type converters, see the base class and "Implementing a Type Converter". > [!NOTE] > 决不要创建的实例类。You should never create an instance of the class. 而应调用方法。Instead, call the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class.
